response.original_title: Hack & Slash Christmas Special the Musical!
response.overview: We have endeavored in this Ghostly little musical, to raise the Ghost of an idea, which shall not put our audience out of humor with themselves, with each other, with the season, or with us. May it haunt your minds pleasantly. - Their faithful Friends and Servants, H & S
response.title: Hack & Slash Christmas Special the Musical!
